ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: ... fealt like I was the only bard in ... I wanted to clarify: I didn t say that I didn t get early breaks.  I said that they weren t as prolific as you were
ygData.messageBody:
>Hehe, where were all you guys last time we went through this thread? I
fealt like I was the only bard in
>Norrath who couldn't get chains to work :)

I wanted to clarify:

I didn't say that I didn't get early breaks. I said that they weren't as
prolific as you were implying. I was in the magi room last night, as the
only snarer (the necro was our cleric, and the fights were relatively short,
so he wasn't darknessing). In three hours of nearly constant pulls, I got
11 early breaks and 2 immediate breaks; these numbers are typical of what I
expect from blue mobs from past experience. My Charisma has always been
between 123 and 148 (currenly 133), if that has anything to do with it.

As to whether or not the recent patch made that the breaks more frequent, I
can't attest to that, since my sample time was only 3 hours, and I could
have been getting lucky with the RNG.

Raiel
